subject: Freestyle Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The Dufour-Lapointes, who include Justine, 19, Chloé, 22, and Maxime, 24, are believed to be at least the fifth family to send at least three siblings to the Games.
snippet: The Dufour-Lapointes, who include Justine, 19, Chloé, 22, and Maxime, 24, are believed to be at least the fifth family to send at least three siblings to the Games.
